economy.name: Kill 30/40/50% vills
economy.desc: When called, Feudal players delete 30% of vills. Castle players delete 40% and Imp players delete 50% of their villager population

economy.name: Delete all farms & eco buildings
economy.desc: Lumber camps, Mills, Mining camps and Farms

economy.name: Send all vills to resources for x seconds
economy.desc: Send all vills to a resource

military.name: Deny a specific unit
military.desc: This denies a single unit. If you already made such units, they are no longer allowed to fight (non attack stance). You are no longer allowed to create the unit either. BUT, if you do an upgrade which changes the unit (e.g. spearman to pikeman or non-elite to elite) you can create and use them again. Unless they block that unit too 11

building.name: Create gap in wall at X
Delete all buildings of type
building.desc: Delete any building of a certain type. Exceptions are castles (krepost), towers (donjon) and TCs.

building.name: Ping TCs
building.desc: REMEMBER to change ALT-T. X all TCs you have!

miscellaneous.name: Send all of resource x
miscellaneous.desc: If a duo player does not have a market, he has to build one. Unless they're not allowed to.

miscellaneous.name: Sacrifice 2/4/10 Trade Carts
miscellaneous.comment:
You cannot ADD (!!!!) anything to the global queue until all trade carts have been sacrificed. This means that if you have upgrades in the queue they do not have to be cancelled! 

FEUDAL = 2 Carts
CASTLE = 4 Carts
IMP = 10 Carts

miscellaneous.name: Request information
miscellaneous.desc: Send an image of the top of your screen. This has to include all 4 resources, pop & villager count, the age bar, your production queue
